name: Riya Marketing
overview: Established in the year 2008, we, “Riya Marketing”, are one of the most renowned ISO 9001:2008 certified organisation engaged in manufacturing and exporting a superior quality range of Sing Chikki, Mava Chikki, Til Chikki, Coconut Chikki, Cashewnut Chikki and Mixed Dry Fruit Chikki. In our range, we offer Til-Sugar Chikki, Til-Jaggery Chikki, Coconut Crush Chikki and Coconut Chips Chikki. Moreover, we offer Mixed Dry Fruit Chikki With Saffron, Mixed Dry Fruit Chikki With Elachi and Cashewnut Chikki to the customer. The entire range offered by us is made using quality-checked ingredients such as jaggery, sugar, dry fruits, sesame seeds, liquid glucose and others. We procure the ingredients to make these products from some of the most trusted vendors of the industry. Our range is available in the market under the brand name of Baba Chikkis
